Text: I will soon run out of ink thanking you for all the hard work and great posts.
Please seed! Yesterday I was getting 100+ kb/s today I'm getting between 10 and 60. :/  I'll seed for a long time when I get this done!
whole seasons have been uploaded in less than 3gb and ur one episode here is more than 1gb. RIDICULOUS. learn how to encode economically.

The quality is good but it took a really long time, probably because the file is HUGE. And what's up with all the extra files; SRT, SMIL? Over 1 GB per episode is just ridiculous. Luckily I have hard drive storage to spare but many people don't. I would recommend a different (smaller) torrent, because this one is kind of a mess. The subtitles are annoying too.
Oh and this can only be played in VLC. I had to download it because none of the 10 other programs on my computer would play the audio.

@xtyrasage: be happy someone gives you the fourth season of Gossip Girl in HD for free! the .smi are korean subtitles and the .srt are the english subtitles. about the filesize, 720p + 42min (something around there) = at least 1GB. Be happy someone gives you entire seasons of good series in hd for free!
Thank you for uploading these, I don't know what these other commenters are complaining about, 1.1 GB per file is standard size for 720p releases.
